video_title: The Step-by-Step Plan to Go From $0 to $10M+

content_profile.title: The Step-by-Step Plan to Go From $0 to $10M+

key_takeaways: Solution: Analyze if you have enough leads to triple - if yes, it's delivery; if no, it's sales (Difficulty: intermediate)
Solution: Transition to scale-up phase focusing on process, people, performance (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: ATM framework for market identification (Channel: content)
AI Workflow: Business automation with AI
Strategy: Triple Triple Double Double - triple revenue 3 times, then double twice

market_gaps.title: Founders struggle after hitting product-market fit with too many leads
market_gaps.solution_approach: Transition to scale-up phase focusing on process, people, performance

market_gaps.title: Determining growth bottlenecks
market_gaps.solution_approach: Analyze if you have enough leads to triple - if yes, it's delivery; if no, it's sales

trend_opportunities.title: AI-enabled business automation
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Build highly optimized businesses with fewer people using AI tools

comment_derived_trends.trend: Founders struggle with retention vs growth prioritization
supporting_comments: Scaling without retention is like pouring water into a leaky bucket
chase top-line growth without locking in retention first
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Strong market need for retention-focused scaling advice and frameworks

comment_derived_trends.trend: Early-stage founders seeking tactical team management advice
supporting_comments: compensation / incentive conversation was really helpful
Glad I heard this early on
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Opportunity to create content/products focused on early-stage team building and incentive design
